docs.lead_paragraph: Scene: Local supermarket. Dramatis personae: Thirtysomething mother accompanied by preschooler in shopping cart. Preschooler (his little body racked by sobs): No peanuts. No peanuts. These, Mommy. These. Like on TV. Peanut butter cups. Peanut butter cups. Mommy, Mommy, please.
